div.head: For adjusting a crooked cannon
div.ab: Take off the breech and place it on an smooth & well-leveled table and pass through the inside a very smooth string without knots, on each end of which there should be a plumb hanging from each side. Then look into the barrel along the string, and if it does not touch equally all over, note the place where it does not touch & hit with a hammer on the outside on that side & in the same place, & thus it will be righted, & do thus all the way round.
